achievements.description: Defeat Piety in her laboratory.

achievements.name: Usurper

achievements.name: Assassin

achievements.name: Conqueror

achievements.name: Seeker
achievements.description: Kill Dominus as the Scion.

achievements.name: Freedom

achievements.name: Beginning of the End
achievements.description: Reach level 60 as a non-Hardcore character.

achievements.name: Foot of the Mountain
achievements.description: Reach level 70 as a non-Hardcore character.

achievements.name: Scaling the Ladder

achievements.name: Diminishing Returns

achievements.name: Survivor

achievements.name: Undying

achievements.name: Immortal
achievements.description: Reach level 80 as a Hardcore character.

achievements.name: Eternal

achievements.name: Locomancer
achievements.description: Tag each waypoint.

achievements.name: No Loose Ends
achievements.description: Complete each side-quest.

achievements.name: All Ears
achievements.description: Listen to all optional NPC dialogue.

achievements.name: No Stone Unturned
achievements.description: Discover all environmental lore.

achievements.name: Left to Chance
achievements.description: Create a Unique item using an Orb of Chance.

achievements.name: Well-Connected
achievements.description: Create an item with six linked sockets using an Orb of Fusing.

achievements.name: Gemling
achievements.description: Have a Skill Gem reach level 20.

achievements.name: Overcharged
achievements.description: Have 15 combined Endurance, Frenzy, and Power Charges active simultaneously.

achievements.name: Elemental Trinity
achievements.description: Slay an enemy that is simultaneously Ignited, Shocked, and Frozen.

achievements.name: Geared Up
achievements.description: Equip a Rare or Unique item in every non-Flask slot.

achievements.name: Cryomancer
achievements.description: Shatter 5 monsters with a single action.

achievements.name: One of a Kind
achievements.description: Equip a Unique item.

achievements.name: Paradigm Shift
achievements.description: Allocate a Keystone Passive Skill.

achievements.name: Cartographer
achievements.description: Fully clear an end-game Map area.

achievements.name: Traitor
achievements.description: Help all three Bandit Lords.

achievements.name: Golden Touch
achievements.description: Open a Large Chest.

achievements.name: Ancestral Power
achievements.description: Have 3 Totems alive at one time.

achievements.name: Out of the Gate
achievements.description: Reach level 8 in any Race Event.

achievements.name: Capture the Flag
achievements.description: Capture a flag during any CTF match.

achievements.name: Zombie Horde
achievements.description: Have 9 Raised Zombies alive at one time.

achievements.name: Elemental Aegis
achievements.description: Have at least 75% resistance to Fire, Ice and Lightning.

achievements.name: Dream within a Dream
achievements.description: Have a Unique Map drop within a Unique Map.

achievements.name: Beginner's Luck
achievements.description: Have a Unique Item drop in the Twilight Strand.

achievements.name: Full Clear: Dread Thicket
achievements.description: Fully clear the Dread Thicket

achievements.name: Specialist
achievements.description: Allocate a character's fourth Keystone Passive.

achievements.name: Full Clear: Catacombs
achievements.description: Fully clear the Catacombs.

achievements.name: Raise the Bar
achievements.description: Have at least 90% resistance to any Element.

achievements.name: Full Clear: Archives
achievements.description: Fully clear the Archives.

achievements.name: Band Together

achievements.name: Full Clear: Ship Graveyard Cave
achievements.description: Fully clear the Ship Graveyard Cave.

achievements.name: Behold My Army

achievements.name: Hostile Territory
achievements.description: Corrupt a map to have eight mods.

achievements.name: Cut-throat
achievements.description: Kill another player in any mode or league.

achievements.name: Dream Corruption
achievements.description: Corrupt a map into a Vaal Temple map.

achievements.name: Virtue Corruption
achievements.description: Corrupt a skill gem into a Vaal skill gem.

achievements.name: Dream Enrichment
achievements.description: Enhance a map with a Vaal fragment.

achievements.name: Identity Corruption
achievements.description: Corrupt an item to have a new implicit mod.

achievements.name: Full Clear: Apex of Sacrifice
achievements.description: Fully clear the Apex of Sacrifice.

achievements.name: Gladiator
achievements.description: Fully clear the Colosseum end-game Map.

achievements.name: Cleanser
achievements.description: Fully clear The Harvest.

achievements.description: Kill Voll, Emperor of Purity.

achievements.description: Kill Doedre Darktongue.

achievements.name: Bringer of Pain

achievements.name: End of the Nightmare
achievements.description: Kill Malachai, The Nightmare.

achievements.name: Invested with Blood
achievements.description: Reserve 95% or more of your Life.

achievements.description: Land the killing blow on the Vaal Oversoul while you have the Fortify Buff active.

achievements.name: Stranger in a Strange Land
achievements.description: Kill a Rogue Exile in Kaom's Stronghold.

achievements.name: Engulfed in Flames

achievements.name: Time Capsule

achievements.name: Maraketh Steel

achievements.name: Unique Influence

achievements.description: Defeat The Elder.

achievements.name: King Tide
achievements.description: Kill Tsoagoth, the Brine King

achievements.name: Widow's Lament
achievements.description: Kill Arakaali, Spinner of Shadows.

achievements.description: Kill both Lunaris and Solaris in the same encounter.

achievements.name: Rule of Three
achievements.description: Kill the Depraved Trinity.

achievements.name: Sin and Salvation

achievements.name: Shaper of Worlds

achievements.description: Kill Argus.

achievements.name: Deicide
achievements.description: Kill a god and obtain their power.

achievements.name: Two of a Kind
achievements.description: Equip two unique items with the same name.

achievements.name: Decimation
achievements.description: Complete a map area that is affected by 10 or more mods. This can include mods from Sextants and other mods that are not on the map item.

achievements.name: Omnipotent

achievements.name: Essence Corruption

achievements.name: Warlord

achievements.name: Augmentation

achievements.name: King Cartographer
